mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "IsuTypeSolution" o WHERE o."orgId" = #{orgId} AND NOT o.disabled AND NOT o.deleted ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.insert: insert into "IsuTypeSolution" (name, "orgId", "defaultVal", "buildIn", deleted, disabled, "createTime") values (#{name}, #{orgId}, #{defaultVal}, #{buildIn}, FALSE, FALSE, NOW())
